data.name: Girl Jigsaw 2 - Patch
data.detailed_description: This DLC contains three naked CG, you just need to complete the puzzle to get them.
data.about_the_game: This DLC contains three naked CG, you just need to complete the puzzle to get them.
data.short_description: Relax puzzle games to keep you in a good mood.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
